article:
Tennis Supply: A High-Speed E-Commerce Catalog

Built with Astro and Airtable, Tennis Supply offers a sleek, high-speed browsing experience perfect for product showcases and affiliate links.

Key Features:

  • Seamless browsing: No cart, just effortless exploration.
  • High-speed performance: Built with Astro for optimal speed.
  • Airtable integration: Easily manage your catalog with Airtable.

See it in action: tennis-supply.vercel.app

Manage your own catalog: Airtable
